channel.title: A Sand County Almanac on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in A Sand County Almanac on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Sand County Almanac, June: "The Alder Fork - A Fishing Idyl"
item.description: We found the main stream to law that the teeter-snipe pattered about in what last year were trout riffles, and so warm that we could duck in its deepest pool without a shout. Even after our cooling swim, waders felt like hot tar paper in the sun. Aldo Leopold, A Sand County Almanac. This 1989 Oxford Paperbacks edition, ISBN 0-19-505928-X, as an introductory essay from Robert Finch commemorating the 100th anniversary of Leopold's birth.

item.title: Aldo Leopold, A Sand County Almanac - grandfather of the Leopold Bros.
